statements: SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT id, metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name='CPU Usage';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100;
SELECT metric_name, value, date_recorded FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT id, metric_name, description FROM performance_metrics WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01' AND metric_name LIKE 'CPU%'
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM performance_metrics WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, metric_name, description FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY metric_name ASC
SELECT * FROM KPIs;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs ORDER BY kpi_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT metric_name, metric_date FROM Metrics WHERE metric_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_description FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value IS NULL;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value > 100
SELECT * FROM Metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM Metrics ORDER BY metric_date DESC
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value < 50 ORDER BY kpi_name ASC
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value, kpi_description FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM dashboard_metrics
SELECT id, metric_name FROM dashboard_metrics ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT metric_value, metric_name FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT * FROM user_metrics ORDER BY total_visits ASC
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM dashboard_users
SELECT * FROM dashboard_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM dashboard_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT user_id, total_visits, last_login, username FROM user_metrics ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT full_name, email FROM dashboard_users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, name, value FROM kpi_metrics;
SELECT widget_id, widget_name, widget_type, widget_data FROM dashboard_widgets;
SELECT user_id, user_name, dashboard_name FROM user_dashboards;
SELECT dashboard_id, log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM dashboard_logs;
SELECT widget_name, widget_type, widget_data, widget_id FROM dashboard_widgets;
SELECT name, value FROM kpi_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM dashboard_widgets WHERE widget_type = 'chart' ORDER BY widget_id DESC
SELECT user_name, dashboard_name FROM user_dashboards WHERE user_id = 1 AND user_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM dashboard_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT widget_name, widget_type, widget_data FROM dashboard_widgets WHERE widget_type IN ('chart', 'table') ORDER BY widget_name
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM dashboard_data WHERE kpi_value > 100;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM dashboard_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM kpi_categories;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, kpi_name, kpi_value FROM dashboard_data WHERE kpi_value > 100 ORDER BY kpi_value DESC;
SELECT d.user_id, d.kpi_name, c.category_name FROM dashboard_data d JOIN kpi_categories c ON d.kpi_name = c.category_name WHERE d.kpi_value < 50;
SELECT u.username, u.email, s.display_mode FROM users u JOIN dashboard_settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.refresh_interval < 30;
SELECT l.log_id, l.timestamp, u.username FROM dashboard_logs l JOIN users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.action = 'login' ORDER BY l.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
